analysis.description:
GridcubePlatformToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/27/0x69a50b4989e00c1278a3135f60b4ccb49a97c465.sol#135) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x69a50b4989e00c1278a3135f60b4ccb49a97c465.sol#245-256)
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0x69a50b4989e00c1278a3135f60b4ccb49a97c465.sol#112-113) is not in mixedCase
